\item 
\#define \hyperlink{apr__inherit_8h_ad4886be514d6cead6bd119a48984d4b5}{A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+D\+E\+C\+L\+A\+R\+E\+\_\+\+I\+N\+H\+E\+R\+I\+T\+\_\+\+U\+N\+S\+ET}(type)
\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
A\+PR File Handle Inheritance Helpers. 

\begin{DoxyRemark}{Remarks}
This internal header includes internal declaration helpers for other headers to declare apr\+\_\+foo\+\_\+inherit\+\_\+\mbox{[}un\mbox{]}set functions. 
\end{DoxyRemark}
